caption.p: Figure S1. Changes of serum levels of IL‐1β, IL‐6, IL‐8, IL‐10 and TNF‐α from baseline at 24 hours of hUCB‐MSC infusion (n = 9). TNF‐α, tumor necrosis factor alpha; hUCB‐MSCs, human umbilical cord blood‐derived mesenchymal stem cell.

Figure S2. Subgroup analysis of changes of serum levels of IL‐1β, IL‐6, IL‐8, IL‐10 and TNF‐α from baseline at 24 hours of hUCB‐MSC infusion in the (A) 2.5 x 10
7
group (n = 3), (B) 5 x 10
7
group (n = 3), and (C) 1 x 10
8
cells group (n = 3). TNF‐α, tumor necrosis factor alpha; hUCB‐MSCs, human umbilical cord blood‐derived mesenchymal stem cell. * p < .05, before versus after treatment (Wilcoxon signed rank test).
